guide.introduction:
How to Repair Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL) Top LCD Screen 3/3

Find high quality inexpensive replacement nintendo ds Lite top LCD screens at the nintendo dsi repair Shop Inc, along with any other nintendo dsi repair parts you may need.

Be sure to check out the other parts of this video as well!

How to Repair Nintendo ds lite Top LCD Part 2/3

How to Repair Nintendo DS Lite Top LCD Part 1/3

guide.summary: This is a step by step guide to replace the Top LCD Screen on your Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL). Fixes symptoms including Top LCD screen won't turn on, Top LCD is scratched, Top LCD has lines, and Nintendo DS Lite won't power on.
guide.title: How to Repair Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL) Top LCD Screen 3/3
